Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Piercing and can curse with Lycanthropy
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Scimitar, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 4: Longbow, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 150/600ft, Average Damage: 6 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, In Humanoid form, the Weretiger makes 2 Scimitar attacks or 2 Longbow attacks.  In Hybrid form, it can attack like a Humanoid or make 2 Claw attacks

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Weretiger can use its action to polymorph into a tiger-humanoid hybrid or into a tiger, or back into its true form, which is Humanoid
Abilities.Ability 2: Keen Hearing and Smell, The Weretiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell
Abilities.Ability 3: Pounce, If the Weretiger moves in a straight line towards a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack, the target makes a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.  If the target is prone, the Weretiger can make one Bit attack against it as a bonus action

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
